lectures.Title: What is Rust?
lectures.Comment: Today's topic is a quick introduction to Rust and how to set up a project.

lectures.Title: Rust Basics - Variables, Control Flow
lectures.Comment: Please ignore what I say in the video regarding Homework 1 release times.

lectures.Title: Strings and Matching
lectures.Comment: This is the first in a 2 part lecture covering Strings, Enums and the match statement. The second one will release tomorrow.

lectures.Title: Enums, Matching
lectures.Comment:
This is the follow up to yesterday's lecture covering Enums and further use of match statements.
Reminder: MP0 is also out on PrairieLearn and will be due in 2 weeks.

lectures.Title: Borrowing and Ownership
lectures.Comment: This got slightly delayed in the announcement but Lecture 5 is out!

lectures.Title: Ownership and Borrowing
lectures.Comment: Lecture 6 is out! Homework 4 is also out on PrairieLearn.

lectures.Title: Borrowing, Slices
lectures.Comment: Lecture 7 is out! Homework 5 is also out on PrairieLearn.

lectures.Title: Structs Part 1
lectures.Comment: The due dates on the last slide are wrong. Homework 5 is this week and MP1 has just been released so you still have 2 weeks.

lectures.Title: Structs Part 2
lectures.Comment: Lecture 9 on Structs has been released here! HW7 isn't out yet but will be out soon (~1 day or so).

lectures.Title: Generics and Smart Pointers
lectures.Comment: First, Lecture 10 on Generics and Smart Pointers have been released alongside HW8. The final project has also been released! Here are the logistics for the final project, containing everything you need to know about the project including logistics, grading etc: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fuu4ZePlBtcC--EBBg4OClNy_KZRHcz_H4ngrZEZOY0/edit?usp=sharing

lectures.Title: Parallelism, Threads
lectures.Comment: Lecture 11 has been released! HW9 and MP2 are also out on PrairieLearn. Also disregard what I said at the end about HW11, I meant to say HW9.

lectures.Title: Messaging
lectures.Comment: Lecture 13 has been released! HW10 and MP3 are also out on PrairieLearn.

lectures.Title: Shared State, Mutex, and Atomic
lectures.Comment: Lecture 15 is here! Sorry for the delay, we had some confusion on the lecture topics. Feel free to revisit this after break and right now, enjoy your spring break!

lectures.Title: Traits
lectures.Comment: Lecture 16 is out! HW 11 is also available on PrairieLearn! This is an experimental homework that the course staff created this semester, and so we are giving you 2 weeks so you have more time to complete it. We are also looking for feedback for this homework, so if you have any complaints please fill out this form: https://forms.gle/ufvChWocsi9iYZPi8

lectures.Title: Special Topics - Rust Project Structure
lectures.Comment: We wanted to release some special topics for those of you working on your final projects over break and looking to get ahead. This special topic is on File Structures and Project Management presented by our CA Porter.

lectures.Title: Special Topics - Quantum Computing in Rust
lectures.Comment: Another special topic lecture is also up, this one presented by our CA Daniel on Quantum Computing in Rust!
